features.name: Courtyard
features.description_sentence: A muddy central courtyard, open to the sky and surrounded by high walls.

features.name: Mess Hall
features.description_sentence: A long hall with rows of wooden tables, smelling of stale ale and old stew.

PEG_V3_GET_NARRATIVE_SEED.Courtyard: The Courtyard is a vast and open space, defining the center of the complex.
PEG_V3_GET_NARRATIVE_SEED.Mess Hall: The Mess Hall echoes with the ghosts of a hundred boisterous meals.

mock_llm_calls.PROCGEN_GENERATE_NARRATIVE_BEAT: In the corner, a sturdy Weapon Rack 1 stands, still holding a few rusty spears.
mock_llm_calls.PEG_V2_GET_AREA_NAMES: Barracks; Armory; Captain's Quarters; Mess Hall; Courtyard; Stables
mock_llm_calls.PEG_V2_RANK_AREAS: Courtyard; Mess Hall; Barracks; Stables; Armory; Captain's Quarters

Courtyard.description: A muddy central courtyard, open to the sky.

Mess Hall.description: A large hall with long wooden tables for dining.

Barracks.description: Rows of bunks for the fortress garrison.

Stables.description: Stalls for horses, smelling of hay and manure.

Armory.description: Racks of weapons and stands of armor line the walls.

Captain's Quarters.description: A private, spartan room for the fort's commander.
